Require Statements: require(guesses[msg.sender].block == 0) to prevent multiple guesses from the same address.
require(msg.value == 1 ether) to ensure users place correct stakes.
Implemented Security Controls.Contract Initialization: Constructor requires a deposit of 1 Ether to initialize the contract.

Fallback Functionality: Not applicable, as there is no specific fallback or receive function in this contract.
